newsitem.title: UK: CRICKET-REIFFEL TO JOIN AUSTRALIA TOUR PARTY.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-REIFFEL TO JOIN AUSTRALIA TOUR PARTY.

text.p: The Victoria fast bowler Paul Reiffel will join the Australian tour of England on Tuesday morning, a team spokesman said on Saturday.
Reiffel is needed because of injuries to Jason Gillespie, who is unlikely to bowl again in the current test at Edgbaston after injuring his hamstring, and Andy Bichel.
Reiffel was chosen in preference to Queensland's Adam Dale because he his familiar with English conditions, having toured successfully with Australia in 1993.
